level.heading: Sale by Mayor of all properties.

level.text: The Mayor shall sell all real property on which the tax is in arrears unless otherwise provided by law.
The Mayor shall designate a single agency to conduct tax sales in the District.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 7 of Real Property Tax Clarity and Litter Control Administration Temporary Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Law 14-8, June 13, 2001, law notification 48 DCR 5916).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
